review: *** ********* ** ********** appropriate decision making, expert in handling high risk cases and her explanation & solution towards health problem is very clear. I had normal vaginal delivery even I'm with polyhydramnios . Overall its a smooth delivery and her team in labour room are also good in guiding me.
She is an excellent person who cares about every patient that she treats. She is an expert in handling critical pregnancy cases. We are always thankful to her.

I'm very thankful to Dr. Bhavana mam.. this is my second baby n for my first baby i had c-sec n this time I want normal delivery.. my Dr recommended her name.. she did VBAC for me.. normal delivery.. me n family are very happy.. Dr is very friendly n her patience levels are great.. I just visited her 2times..
She is capable of handling high risk pregnancies. Today we are happy with our baby because of her only.
